name: Canal
description: A man-made waterway provides transportation for goods and people through difficult terrain. The controlled water flow allows for reliable transportation, while the strategic importance makes it a target for military control and sabotage.
atmosphere: Flowing water creates a liquid highway while boat traffic glides through controlled channels. The air carries the scent of fresh water, earth, and the promise of controlled transportation. Every surface feels damp with strategic importance. Your skin feels the water's touch and the sense of controlled flow. The taste of reliable transportation and strategic vulnerability fills your mouth.
